body_html:
I am using Ubuntu 16.04 with nvidia-driver 384.90, python 3.5 and pytorch 0.3.0.post4 Installed via pip (cuda8 version).

Using e.g. "NVIDIA X Server Settings" I am able to switch between the integrated intel gpu and the nvidia one. I remarked that when I use the nvidia one everything works fine. However when I switch to the intel one I get the same segfault when importing pytorch. (should hope that it works with cpu only instead.) Hope this could somehow help your debugging process.

I have also used pytorch 0.2 before (also installed via pip) and didn't recall any problem like this. (or maybe I was lucky and never used pytorch under intel gpu before?)
